email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 12,000MT - MV OCEAN TRADER
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of soybean meal from Santos to Rotterdam under FOB terms. We understand that your vessel, the MV OCEAN TRADER, might be available for this route. Could you confirm her current position and availability? Additionally, could you provide an initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 12,000MT - MV OCEAN TRADER
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for your inquiry. The MV OCEAN TRADER is currently in Durban and can be positioned to Santos for your laycan, ideally starting from November 20. The initial freight quote for the shipment would be USD 45 per metric tonne. This rate includes fuel but excludes any potential demurrage charges.

Please let me know if you need further details.

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 12,000MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 45 seems a bit high considering the current market conditions. Could you possibly review this? Also, could you specify the demurrage rates and the expected loading window in Santos?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 12,000MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we are pleased to offer a revised rate of USD 42 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window in Santos is expected to be from November 20 to November 25.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 12,000MT - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the rate of USD 42 per metric tonne and the demurrage terms. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements for the MV OCEAN TRADER to be in Santos by November 20.

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 12,000MT - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements for the MV OCEAN TRADER to be in Santos by November 20. I will send you the final contract details shortly.

Best regards,
John Smith
